com.hazelcast.spi

Interface OperationService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InternalOperationService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OperationServiceImpl

    public interface OperationService
    The OperationService is responsible for executing operations.

    A single operation can be executed locally using run(Operation) and execute(Operation). Or it can executed remotely using one of the send methods.

    It also is possible to execute multiple operation on multiple partitions using one of the invoke methods.

      • invokeOnAllPartitions

        Map<Integer,Object> invokeOnAllPartitions(String serviceName,
                                          OperationFactory operationFactory)
                                   throws Exception
        Invokes a set of operations on each partition.

        This method blocks until the operation completes.

        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service.
        operationFactory - the factory responsible for creating operations
        Returns:
        a Map with partitionId as a key and the outcome of the operation as a value.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • invokeOnPartitions

        <T> Map<Integer,T> invokeOnPartitions(String serviceName,
                                      OperationFactory operationFactory,
                                      Collection<Integer> partitions)
                               throws Exception
        Invokes a set of operations on selected set of partitions.

        This method blocks until all operations complete.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of result of operations returned by operationFactory
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        operationFactory - the factory responsible for creating operations
        partitions - the partitions the operation should be executed on.
        Returns:
        a Map with partitionId as a key and the outcome of the operation as a value.
        Throws:
        Exception - if there was an exception while waiting for the results of the partition invocations

      • invokeOnPartitionsAsync

        <T> ICompletableFuture<Map<Integer,T>> invokeOnPartitionsAsync(String serviceName,
                                                               OperationFactory operationFactory,
                                                               Collection<Integer> partitions,
                                                               ExecutionCallback<Map<Integer,T>> callback)
        Invokes a set of operations on selected set of partitions in an async way.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of result of operations returned by operationFactory
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        operationFactory - the factory responsible for creating operations
        partitions - the partitions the operation should be executed on.
        callback - optional callback
        Returns:
        a future returning a Map with partitionId as a key and the outcome of the operation as a value.

      • invokeOnPartitions

        Map<Integer,Object> invokeOnPartitions(String serviceName,
                                       OperationFactory operationFactory,
                                       int[] partitions)
                                throws Exception
        Invokes a set of operations on selected set of partitions.

        This method blocks until all operations complete.

        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        operationFactory - the factory responsible for creating operations
        partitions - the partitions the operation should be executed on.
        Returns:
        a Map with partitionId as a key and the outcome of the operation as a value.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • send

        boolean send(Operation op,
             Address target)
        Executes an operation remotely.

        It isn't allowed

        Parameters:
        op - the operation to send and execute.
        target - the address of that target member.
        Returns:
        true if send is successful, false otherwise.
